topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538aaa7e6368727d8b340000#post_538aaa7e6368727d8b340000
You are assuming based on a bit of pop culture that a sapient life form grown in a lab would be inherently morally inferior to humans born through the purely mundane forms of reproduction.

You are essentially stating that circumstances of birth are more important for how a person ought to be viewed than anything else.

Harsh does not fucking cover it. Try hateful, fear mongering, borderline racist and ignorant.
